headline: Silicon Laboratories: Rating Upgrade As Q4 2024 Results Are More Bullish On Outlook
summary: Silicon Labs' 1Q25 guidance indicates accelerating growth, with 7% sequential and 67% y/y revenue growth. See why I upgrade SLAB stock from buy to strong buy.
